original_text:
Yet when I surveyed all that my hands had done
    and what I had toiled to achieve,
everything was meaningless, a chasing after the wind;
    nothing was gained under the sun.
korean_text: 그 후에 내가 생각해 본즉 내 손으로 한 모든 일과 내가 수고한 모든 것이 다 헛되어 바람을 잡는 것이며 해 아래에서 무익한 것이로다

sentences.original_text: Yet when I surveyed all that my hands had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 내 손이 한 모든 것을 살펴볼 때

sentences.original_text: and what I had toiled to achieve
nothing was gained under the sun
sentences.korean_translation: 해 아래서 얻은 것이 아무것도 없었다
